name: Add Revision to Sheets
description: Adds a new revision to all sheets in the current project.

name: Copy Elements from Link File
description: Copies elements, such as annotations or specific model components, from a linked file into the host model.

name: Create Worksets in Project
description: Automates the creation of new worksets based on a predefined list or template.

name: Dimensions Set Values
description: Modifies the text value of selected dimensions to a specified number or text string.

name: Load all Ann Component
description: Loads all annotation components from a specified library into the project.

name: Load all Symbol
description: Loads all standard symbols from a library into the current project.

name: Load all Tag
description: Loads a collection of tags for various categories into the project.

name: Remove Revision from Sheets
description: Removes a specific revision from selected sheets.

name: Replace Families Types by Names
description: Swaps family types within the model by matching their names.

name: Set Assembly Code By Categories
description: Assigns assembly codes to model elements based on their category.

name: Base Plate Modeling
description: Automates the placement and configuration of base plates in a structural model.

name: Base Plate Set Level
description: Sets the level parameter for base plate elements to a specified level.

name: Base Plate Set Type
description: Assigns the correct family type to base plates based on a predefined set of rules.

name: Base Plates Load from Excel
description: Imports data from an Excel spreadsheet to create or update base plate elements in the project.

name: Base Plates Schedules Export to Excel
description: Exports base plate schedules from the project to a structured Excel file.

name: Base Plates Set Value from Excel
description: Updates parameter values for base plate elements using data from an Excel spreadsheet.

name: Roc Anchors Schedules Export to Excel
description: Exports rock anchor schedules from the project to an Excel file.

name: Roc Anchors Set Value from Excel
description: Updates parameter values for rock anchor elements using data from an Excel spreadsheet.

name: Steel Columns Load from Excel
description: Imports steel column data from an Excel spreadsheet to create or update column elements.

name: Steel Columns Schedule Export to Excel
description: Exports steel column schedules from the project to a structured Excel file.

name: DÃ©tails Typiques
description: Manages and places typical details from a library onto sheets.

name: Export Schedules to Excel
description: Exports all schedules from the project into a single or multiple Excel spreadsheets.

name: General Notes Update from Excel
description: Updates general notes on sheets with content from a specified Excel file.

name: Manage Parameters on Sheets
description: Manages and standardizes parameters on multiple sheets, ensuring consistency.

name: Open Project File Folder
description: Quickly opens the folder containing the current project file.

name: Override Annotations in Views on Sheets
description: Applies graphic overrides to annotations within views that are placed on sheets.

name: Override Texts in Views on Sheets
description: Applies graphic overrides specifically to text elements within views on sheets.

name: Rename Section Views on Sheers
description: Standardizes the naming convention of section views placed on sheets.

name: Transfer Legends from File
description: Transfers legend views and their contents from one project file to another.

name: Views Templates Transfer from File
description: Transfers a set of view templates from a source file into the current project.
